I'm trying photorec now.  It looks like it's what I'm looking for,
you need to modprobe ndiswrapper
and blacklist any alternate modules that would prevent ndiswrapper from working
if you want ndiswrapper to load on startup, you need to add ndiswrapper to your /etc/modules
the modprobe didn't work.  what modules conflict with ndiswrapper?
it would show as alternate drivers or something when you do ndiswrapper -l
how do I disable prism2_usb?
gksudo gedit /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist
then add blacklist prism2_usb on a new line at the bottom, then save
then sudo modprobe -r ndiswrapper, then sudo modprobe ndiswrapper
then gksudo gedit /etc/modules, add ndiswrapper to a new line at the bottom, save
if net connectivity still does not work, reboot
thanks, unloading and reloading it worked.  I didn't even have to reboot.
